name: .MEPJ
summary: Learn about .MEPJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a MEPJ file with Movavi Video Editor (Windows, Mac), which is available as both a standalone application and as part of Movavi Video Suite. To do so, select File â†’ Open Project... from Video Editor's menu bar. Then, locate and open your MEPJ file.
You can use Movavi Video Editor to export the project a MEPJ file contains in various video and audio formats, including but not limited to:
